ValidationRule.description: This rule prevents the user from making changes to any field except the descriptions or status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.cgcloud__Validation_Rules_Setting__c.cgcloud__Bypass_Validation__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Status__c, 'Active') || ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Status__c, 'On Hold'), ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Fund_Template__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Currency__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Anchor_Account__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Anchor_Product__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Valid_From__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only the descriptions and status fields can be changed
